entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 this morning then northwest 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
